bike.description: Diamond frame design with 6061 aluminum oversized tubing, sloping top tube design, water bottle bosses, alloy kickstand, and painted steel chainguard
bike.paint_description: Gloss Black, Goldenrod, Kiwi, Sunset Red

components.description: Oversized hi-tensile steel tubular unicrown with leading dropout and fender boss
Alex X303 36H silver anodized alloy rims with alloy double-sealed front and Shimano CB rear hubs, heavy-duty 12 gauge stainless steel spokes
Forged alloy crank, 170mm, with 44T alloy compact disc chainring
Sealed cartridge BB with alloy cups & sheath, 68 x 116mm
Cruiser platform with heat-treated axles and rustless bushings
Alloy hi-rise, 150mm quill, 100mm extension, with removeable 2-bolt cap
Kraton comfort type with full length,extra-thick, foam bar pads
Alloy pillar style, 26.8 x 300mm, with plugged top, welded seat collar with chromoly QR
Taxi design with extra padding, extra-thick vinyl cover, heavy-duty strut rails & double-loop springs with bag loops
